h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Tiger Tally Location
content: The Tiger Tally Curios can be found within the secret Kingdom of Sahali area in Yellow Wind Ridge. In this area, you will need to defeat another "Tiger Vanguard") to progress, which will drop the Curios.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Tiger_Tally.md', within the main section titled 'Tiger Tally', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Tiger Tally Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Tiger Tally Curios can be found within the secret Kingdom of Sahali area in Yellow Wind Ridge. In this area, you will need to defeat another "Tiger Vanguard") to progress, which will drop the Curios.
